title: Dedicated Server [Counter-Strike 1.6 and Condition Zero]
description:
Hello all :)
This torrent is for all of you, who are making dedicated servers through your STEAM accounts...

Well..
Here you got a dedicated server for Counter-Strike 1.6 and Condition Zero


Hint*
If you run your dedicated server in console mode it would run better :)
This is how you do it!

-Go find the "hlds".
-Right click and click: Send to -> Desktop.
-Now go to your desktop and right click on "Shortcut to hlds" and click "properties"
-Now you can see "C:\Dedicated\hlds.exe"
-Put this after hlds.exe: -console -game cstrike +port 27015 +map de_dust2 +maxplayers 20 -autoupdate -insecure

( Take a look here: http://www.cs.yellowside.dk/billeder/hlds.jpg )

-console (for console mode)
-game cstrike (for the game mode cstrike/czero)
+port 27015 (for the server port)
+map de_dust2 (for the startup map)
+maxplayers 20 (for how meny players)
-autoupdate (auto update the server)
-insecure (-insecure for NON-VAC. Remove it if you want VAC on)


Thats all for now.. if people download this torrent i maybe make some updates, if not.. yeah the torrent can die ;D

Enjoy!
